sentences.english: But monolingual adults need to be reminded of the past too.
sentences.chinese: 但我們也有必要讓那些單語的成年人也知道歷史。

sentences.english: In contrast, patients with cognitive impairment were more common in monolinguals.
sentences.chinese: 相反，認知功能障礙在單語患者中更常見。

sentences.english: Bilingual people scored higher than monolinguals, people who speak only one language.
sentences.chinese: 雙語人得分比單語高，誰的人講只有一種語言。
